summary: Designed as a secret, ancient hide-a-way for our Dovahkiin Hero
descriptionHtml:
This is a Release Candidate for RND\'s Dovahkiin Castle. Please comment with any ideas or problems you find. This is My first Mod, so please be patient and kind. Feel free to email Me with comments or concerns or ideas at vvlestat2k6vv@hotmail.com. Enjoy.

The Castle features a large hall with throne, an armory, for all your armor and weapon crafting needs, as well as a fully functioning Library, with and Alchemy workstation for all your potion studies. The upper floor contains the Bedroom with a warm fireplace for our hero to take a well deserved rest. the door across the hall opens to a balcony overlooking the cave inwhich the Castle is built. 

Original Features:
Armory - 
   4 weapon cases
   4 Weapon Plaques
   12 Mannequinns
   Forge
   Smelting pot
   Grinding Wheel
   Workstation
   Enchanting Station

Library - 
   13 Functioning Bookshelves
   A small Garden
   Alchemy Station

Bedroom

Balcony

Throne Room

Kitchen

Dining Hall
author: CaptRaven
